UsersalmonActionClass for a salmon that is directed at a specific user

UsersalmonAction

Class for a salmon that is directed at a specific user

Notice must either be

  • in reply to a notice by this user
  • in reply to a notice to the attention of this user
  • to the attention of this user
  • reference the user as an activity:object
